sentences.en: Adoration will give new power for intercession.
sentences.cn: 敬拜能使代祷有一种新的能力.

sentences.en: As we go on in intercession we may find that our obedience to God is going to cost other people more than we thought.
sentences.cn: 我们代求的时候，会发觉对神的顺服，与别人的得失有极大的关系，这是我们想不到的。

sentences.en: But how much greater the glory of intercession!
sentences.cn: 然而代祷的荣耀更是何等大!

sentences.en: Dickens had humorously suggested a special service of intercession at St. Paul's cathedral.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯幽默地建议在圣保罗大教堂提供一种特殊服务——代祷.

sentences.en: For it is sanctified through the word of God and intercession.
sentences.cn: 5都藉着神的话和人的代求,成为圣别了.

sentences.en: His intercession could be of help to the tribe.
sentences.cn: 他的调解可能会帮上该部落的忙。

sentences.en: Intercession is to be the great link between heaven and earth.
sentences.cn: 神儿子的祷告是从地上开始,一直继续在天上.

sentences.en: Let Christians and ministers agree and bind themselves together for this worldwide intercession.
sentences.cn: 但愿所有的信徒及传道人能同心合意地为着全地的人代祷.

sentences.en: Peter, at the intercession of old Savelitch, was spared by Pougatcheff.
sentences.cn: 由于老仆沙威里奇的求情, 彼得被普加乔夫赦免了.

sentences.en: She said she did not need intercession about her marriage.
sentences.cn: 她说她的婚姻不需要仲裁.

sentences.en: The achieved agreement after intercession is as valid as the quasi - judicial writ.
sentences.cn: 经调解达成的调解协议具有准司法文书的效力.

sentences.en: The intercession has made a rapid progress.
sentences.cn: 调解已经取得了很大的进展.

sentences.en: The pouring out of the soul — that is the Divine meaning of intercession.
sentences.cn: 他将命倾倒——就是代祷的神圣意义,唯有如此才能使他的奉献及祷告能在神面前有能力.

sentences.en: Through the intercession of him, my request was granted.
sentences.cn: 通过他的求情, 我的要求如愿以偿.

sentences.en: Tim. 4:5 For it is sanctified through the word of God and intercession.
sentences.cn: 提前四5都藉著神的话和人的代求,成为圣别了.

sentences.en: What an unspeakable blessing there is in intercession.
sentences.cn: 代祷里的祝福是述说不尽的.

trans.tran_cn: 求情，说情，调停， 斡旋
trans.tran_en: when someone talks to a person in authority in order to prevent something bad happening to someone else
